text: Brittany Ashworth is a British actress, best known for her roles as Juliet in the film Hostile and Alex Ratcliffe in Mrs Ratcliffe's Revolution ==Career== Ashworth appeared in Mrs Ratcliffe's Revolution and Mobile before studying English Literature at the University of Oxford. After graduating, she played Sister Vaduva in The Crucifixion opposite Sophie Cookson before playing the lead role of Juliet in the apocalyptic film Hostile. She also played Fran Adams in British comedy, Accident Man, and was cast in Guy Ritchie's The Gentlemen. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
